line: Hi! This is Cheryl from HR. I'm calling about Greg. Have you seen him talking to the stapler again?
I knew you'd understand! Yesterday, he lectured the coffee machine about its feelings. It's affecting office morale.

choices.text: Encourage him — maybe the stapler needs therapy.

line: Oh, you're serious? Good! Sharon thinks the vending machine is haunted and left offerings of granola bars. Can you believe it?
The office is spiraling. Greg just started a meditation circle for inanimate objects. Sharon is now vice-priestess of the vending shrine.

choices.text: Join the cult to report back.

line: Chaos reigns! Greg now claims the stapler revealed a secret project called 'Reverie.' Should I tell everyone?
